purpose: Ulm University, Germany, is announcing an open position for an Assistant Professor of Software Engineering. The application deadline is June 29, 2025, and interested candidates can apply through the provided online portal. The university seeks a candidate with an international track record in software engineering, who will contribute to both research and teaching. The position offers opportunities for interdisciplinary collaboration and aims to strengthen the university's teaching portfolio in software engineering. The university encourages qualified female scientists to apply and provides preferential consideration to severely disabled applicants.

evidence_sentences: Ulm University, Germany, is looking to hire an Assistant Professor of Software Engineering.

The Faculty of Engineering, Computer Science and Psychology, the Institute of Software Engineering and Programming Language, is seeking to fill the position, starting as soon as possible, of a Assistant Professor (W1) of Software Engineering (no tenure track).

We are seeking an exceptional candidate with an international track record in the field of software engineering to strengthen the area of practical computer science at Ulm University with respect to research and teaching.
The successful candidate will propose a research program that strengthens and complements the research expertise in the institute, the faculty and the university as a whole.
We are looking for an individual with a passion for teaching to strengthen our teaching portfolio for our software engineering B.Sc. and M.Sc. programs.
The University is seeking to increase the proportion of women in research and teaching and particularly encourage qualified female scientists to apply for this position.
We look forward to your application via our online application portal: https://stellenangebote.uni-ulm.de/aznsw
